You'll need the following to upgrade Clan level: *Level 1* - SP : 20,000, Adena : 650,000%% *Level 2* - SP : 100,000, Adena : 2,500,000%% *Level 3* - SP : 350,000, Item : Blood Mark%% *Level 4* - SP : 1,000,000, Item : Alliance Manifesto%% *Level 5* - SP : 2,500,000, Item : Seal of Aspiration%% *Level 6* - Clan Reputation : 10,000, Clan Members : More than 30%% *Level 7* - Clan Reputation : 20,000, Clan Members : More than 50%% *Level 8* - Clan Reputation : 40,000, Clan Members : More than 80%% Get the Blood Mark by hunting the Blood Queen in Watcher's Tomb and the Seal of Shilen.%% To get the Aliance Manifesto, see Sir Kristof Rodemai in the Town of Giran.%% To get the Seal of Aspiration, see Sir Gustav Athebaldt in the Town of Oren%% How to obtain Blood Pledge Reputation Rate.%%
